column4: I'm looking for a little help with permissions.  Network drive crashed put the network drive in the PC and I don't have rights to move the files to a new harddrive so I can reformat the network drive. Any gurus want to help me out?
iRRvi , my experience in linux is extremely limited I need someone to hold my hand or point me in the right direction - sudo leaves me stranded i'm not knowledgeable enough
sorry...but its for your own good
